newsitem.title: USA: Uniforce Services to start AMEX trading.
newsitem.headline: Uniforce Services to start AMEX trading.

text.p: Uniforce Services Inc said on Wednesday that its common stock would begin trading on the American Stock Exchange under the symbol "UFR" on June 26.
The company's common stock will cease trading on the Nasdaq National Market after the close on June 25.
